content:
MK-1533
June 11, 1962
Mr. W. K. Ku Chief Engineer Shihmen Development Commission Shihifen Camp Taiwan
Subject: GSA Surplus Materials
Dear Mr. Ku:
GSA Catalogue No. 41 page 6 indicates the availability of wire rope as follows:
GSA - Control No. 9-62, X40779 (4) N-387-62-604 - Wire Rope Steel 2" 6 x 37, galvanized, Type I, Class 3, Construction 2, Regular Lay, Right hand Helix. 4010-286-7679 - N-2 Condition 6,880 Ft. Available 6-26-62.
GSA Control - No. 9-62, X-40782 (40 N-7-62-311 Wire Rope, Improved plow steel, preformed, regular lay, fibre core, right hand, helix, uncoated, Size: 1->" × 6 × 19. GL4010-118-2321. 1-1 1,500 Ft. ARD 6-26-62.
We recommend that the above items be acquired through the proper channels.
Please return the attached GSA catalogue to Mr. J. B. Carter AID/T after it has served your purpose.
Very truly yours, MORRISON-KNUDSEN OF ASIA, INC.
Slum @John Glenn C. Johnson Project Manager
cc: Dam Construction Dept. J. B. Carter
0213 D
GCJ/rw
245
